page_content:
Cinos Communications Services

Compute as a Service - Essential

Compute as a Service Essential provides lowest cost compute resources to rapidly provision and scale environments which are not performance sensitive in a flexible and autonomous manner. Skyscape provides this service across two security domains; Assured OFFICIAL and Elevated OFFICIAL .

Features

  • Flexible and autonomous; consumers manage the environment themselves
  • Optimised for OFFICIAL with independent validation
  • Aligned with CESG Cloud Security Principles
  • Set and control access, user profiles and capabilities
  • Range of Service Levels with up to 99.99% SLA
  • Connect over the internet, PSN or N3
  • HybridConnect, connect over leased line, MPLS or CPA Encryption
  • Stop, start, clone, delete, move VMs as you need
  • UK Sovereign, UK Domained. Data never leaves the UK
  • Cross Domain Zone; internet access to the Elevated domain

Benefits

  • Assured; hosted in the UK by SC cleared operatives
  • True cloud pricing; only paying for what you use
  • Programmatically control compute environments via documented API and portal
  • Become more agile with on demand resources instantly available
  • Green; based in UK facilities which offer market-leading efficiency
  • Pay by the hour or GB of storage
  • Available immediately, across both Security Domains
  • Dedicated Compute option available for specific licensing requirements
  • Free, no commitment 30 day trial available
  • DDoS protection included for Internet facing services

Pricing

£0.01 per virtual machine per hour

  • Excluding VAT
  • Education pricing available
  • Minimum contract period: Hour
  • Trial and free options available
